name: FUSE (itch) (Ossi)
description:
Theme: “Delay the inevitable”

Spark the flames on fuses to keep them going until the very last second!

The more you click and the more fuses that remain by the end will increase your score!

Controls: Mouse-Only! Left click on flames to keep them alive!

If you've participated in Ludum Dare 50 and want to vote check out the main page here!

Software Used: Unity 2020.3.15f2, Pyxel Edit, Famistudio

Made in 48-hours for Ludum Dare 50!
